name: Data Analyst[Data]
description:
We are looking for a savvy Data analyst to join our Data team. You will be helping various departments make important business decisions based on data. We actively seek hard-working and self-organized individuals with an intrinsic interest in data analysis and data / BI platforms. The ideal candidate has strong experience in data field working as Data Analyst or Business Intelligence Engineer.

WHAT YOU WILL DO

  • Proactively build and improve the organization’s business intelligence platform: organize dashboards, queries, permissions, data model;
  • Build reporting pipelines for Finance, Operations, Compliance and other departments;
  • Analyze current and historical data;
  • Proactively work on automation for data related to company’s operations;
  • Help other departments to prepare data reports for operational activities, audit, etc;
  • Monitor and provide transparency for data quality across the organizational reporting;
  • Create data documentation for non-technical users;
  • Work closely with data engineering team on data modelling and building production level datasets.

WHAT WE OFFER

  • Friendly remote environment;
  • Flexible schedule, but for BI team it is required to be available in UTC+8 working hours;
  • International geo distributed team;
  • Opportunity for business trips to SEA countries;
  • Openness for new technologies;
  • AWS;
  • Focus on continuous learning and development;
  • Flexible vacation.

REQUIRED HARD AND SOFT SKILLS

  • Advanced SQL is a must;
  • Data modelling for business use cases & self-service;
  • Administering BI platform, preferably with hundreds of reports & dashboards, and for 100+ users;
  • Data analysis;
  • Being able to manage stakeholders, understand & define requirements, and present solutions effectively as well as being able to document these clearly to serve as reference for technical and non-technical users.

SKILLS GOOD TO HAVE

  • Python experience;
  • Experience on data warehouse, data lake, ETL frameworks, Apache Spark is good-to-have;
  • Domain knowledge of digital wallet / p2p finance & payments / crypto industry is nice-to-have;
  • Apache spark;
  • Knowledge of any ETL framework;
  • Data warehouse / Data lake experience.
